sect1.title: About the Making of This Documentation
sect1.para: This document was created with the following open-source software:

listitem.para: The XML source is written according to the GeekoDoc schema (see ), a subset of the DocBook 5 schema (see ).
The XML source is validated with jing (see ).
It was processed with DAPS, the DocBook Authoring and Publishing Suite (see ).
DAPS builds upon a number of other tools, such as xsltproc to apply XSLT stylesheets (see ) and Apache FOP to generate PDF files (see ).
